title: MG announces MGS5 new EV SUV
description: MG Motor UK has confirmed the MGS5 EV, an all-electric SUV debuting this Spring. Built on the modular scalable platform (MSP), it will focus on performance, efficiency, and interior space.
author: Car Body Design
excerpt: MG Motor UK has confirmed the MGS5 EV, an all-electric SUV debuting this Spring. Built on the modular scalable platform (MSP), it will focus on performance, efficiency, and interior space.
text: MG Motor UK has confirmed the MGS5 EV, an all-electric SUV debuting this Spring. Built on the modular scalable platform (MSP), it will focus on performance, efficiency, and interior space. MG Motor UK has announced the MGS5 EV, a new electric SUV set to launch this Spring. It will be based on the modular scalable platform (MSP), which was previously used in the MG4 hatchback. This platform is designed to support efficient driving and a long range, while the SUV format provides more interior space and practicality. The MGS5 EV will introduce a new cabin design with advanced features, offering a different interior experience compared to previous MG models. More details about the vehicle’s specifications will be released in the coming weeks. (Source: MG)
html:
MG Motor UK has confirmed the MGS5 EV, an all-electric SUV debuting this Spring. Built on the modular scalable platform (MSP), it will focus on performance, efficiency, and interior space.

MG Motor UK has announced the MGS5 EV, a new electric SUV set to launch this Spring. It will be based on the modular scalable platform (MSP), which was previously used in the MG4 hatchback. This platform is designed to support efficient driving and a long range, while the SUV format provides more interior space and practicality.

The MGS5 EV will introduce a new cabin design with advanced features, offering a different interior experience compared to previous MG models. More details about the vehicle’s specifications will be released in the coming weeks.

(Source: MG)
